headline: Shapiro Announces Expansion of Snyder County Treatment Program
author: WKOK Staff
sentences: The program is a collaborative law enforcement program allowing Pennsylvanians seeking treatment for addiction to use their local law enforcement as a resource to contact participating treatment partners without the threat of arrest.
SELINSGROVE â€“ State Attorney General Josh Shapiro visited the Valley Wednesday to announce the expansion of treatment programs in Snyder County.
During a news conference in Selinsgrove, Shapiro announced the expansion of the Law Enforcement Treatment Initiative (LETI).
You can watch the announcement on the WKOK Facebook page and more information will be posted on WKOK.com.
